name: Beasts and Knives
description:
Created for 7DRL 2022 

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Weapons, single or dual equipped, provide differing attack ranges and damage.
  • Armor, provides varying degress of HP maximums
  • HP replenishes between fights (bread and circuses) 
  • Enemies will never drop more than one item
  • Proceed to the next level by returning to the opened tunnel after all enemies are vanquished
